scripts.publish-components: cd projects/ng-components && npm version patch && cd../.. && ng build ng-components --configuration=production && ts-node ./projects/ng-components/scripts/css-bundle.ts && cd dist/ng-components && npm publish
scripts.publish-auth: cd projects/ng-auth && npm version patch && cd../.. && ng build ng-auth --configuration=production && cd dist/ng-auth && npm publish
scripts.publish-components-beta: cd projects/ng-components && npm version prerelease --preid beta && cd../.. && ng build ng-components --configuration=production && ts-node ./projects/ng-components/scripts/css-bundle.ts && cd dist/ng-components && npm publish
scripts.publish-auth-beta: cd projects/ng-auth && npm version prerelease --preid beta && cd../.. && ng build ng-auth --configuration=production && cd dist/ng-auth && npm publish
